org.gvsig.geoprocess.algorithm.buffer

Interface IDistance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDistance, ConstantDistance, FieldDistance

    public interface IDistance
    Computes a size of each geometry built

      • setNumberOfRings

        void setNumberOfRings(int n)
        Sets the number of rings. This number is multiplied by the Buffer distance. For instance, for a constant distance of 500 meters and two rings, the getBufferDistance will give a value of 1000
